text: Judge Kavanaugh is a highly-qualified justice committed to the rule of law and the United States Constitution.  I congratulate Judge Kavanaugh on being confirmed by the U.S. Senate for his lifetime appointment to the Supreme Court of the United States. #JusticeKavanaugh

Like many Americans, I remain horrified about the crimes committed by Larry Nassar, the USA Gymnastics doctor who abused hundreds of young athletes. The actions of Larry Nassar & the individuals & institutions that facilitated and protected his behavior are reprehensible. (1/3)

.@SenatorShaheen and I called on the former USOC CEO Scott Blackmun to resign earlier this year, to start the process of holding Olympic leadership accountable for fostering a culture that prioritized winning medals over the welfare of young athletes. (2/3)

I‚Äôm glad to see USOC‚Äôs current CEO Sarah Hirshland is taking action to start rebuilding trust w/our country‚Äôs athletes & the American ppl. I also want to applaud the young women who have & continue to make their voices heard, calling for change & a new vision for the sport. (3/3)

My deepest sympathies and prayers are with the families and friends of the victims and the Thousand Oaks community.  May God heal this community from this act of violence (2/2).

1/3 Well said, @SenatorLankford. We are $21 trillion in debt. Since 1974, we have passed all of our spending bills only 4 times! And, in the past 20 years, we have only passed a budget 11 times. We need to fix our broken budget and approps process. https://t.co/rMO7Glbt60

2/3 The Joint Select Committee on Budget and Appropriations Reform, on which I serve, is tasked with fixing this process so we finish our work on time. Ironically, halfway through our markup, the Committee decided to adjourn until just a few days before our statutory deadline.

3/3 Iowans know that you don‚Äôt take a vacation until the job is done. That‚Äôs why I introduced the No Budget, No Vacation Act, which would prevent Congress from going on recess if we don‚Äôt pass a budget & fund the gov‚Äôt on time. I will bring this up for a vote when we reconvene.
